manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Gel Computer Mouse Pad with Wrist Support Rest For Every Type of Mouse The mouse pad combines a smooth-gliding, durable fabric surface with a gel wrist rest for excellent performance and comfort. Gel Support Featuring a wide gel-filled section that supports to the wrist when operating a mouse, helping reduce fatigue during long work days. Non-Slip Base Designed to be used on hard, flat surfaces, the mouse pad offers a non-slip, rubberized base that keeps it securely in place. Compact Size Perfect for using at home or at the office, the mouse pad features a compact size that doesn’t obstruct your desk space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Functionality in a Compact Package!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The Amazon Basics Rectangular Gel Computer Mouse Pad with Wrist Support Rest, in a sleek black design, is a compact gem for anyone seeking both comfort and functionality in their workspace.The gel wrist support is a game-changer. It provides a comfortable resting place for your wrist, preventing strain and discomfort during long hours of computer use.The mouse pad’s compact size is perfect for smaller work areas. It fits comfortably on any desk and offers an ample surface for smooth mouse movement.The non-slip base ensures the pad stays in place during use, so you can work or play without any annoying shifting.The quality of the materials is impressive, ensuring the pad and wrist support remain in top condition through extended use.For those who value ergonomic comfort and precision in their computer work or gaming, the Amazon Basics Gel Mouse Pad is an excellent choice. It’s an affordable and practical addition to any workspace, providing the support you need without sacrificing desk space. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice basic Mousepad with Wrist Support
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mousepad and works as advertised. The wrist part is nice and squishy but not too much, so there is the support you need. My optical mouse works very nice on this, and tracks very well. My old one I had to pick up the mouse to reorientation it to the pad, but not with this one. If you just need something to support your wrist and not lose track of your mouse, this is a great item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wrist rest
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this thing for years. It's held up quite well and does its job admirably. Doesn't take up much room, either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Office Use Only
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to replace an aging wrist pad for my workstation at my full-time job, and it has had its ups and downs.The fresh wrist rest was a nice boon, but I did not care for the feel of the material the pad is made of on my wrist. It's silky but rather slippery, so you try to put some pressure down and your wrist might slide to one side or another.Speaking of sliding, the grippy material on the underside is pretty poor quality. So not only will your wrist my slipping, but the pad itself can move around with even just a little nudging.And the cheery on top is that obnoxious lip the pad has around the wrist rest, it does nothing and just takes up more room on the desk, forcing me to push my full-sized keyboard more to my left instead of leaving it centered. And the shape of it too, I get the point, helps for sweeping motions of the mouse, but again, it does nothing in an office setting besides get in the way.Might have gone even a star lower, but the thing does what it should, gives you a place to put your wrist to avoid getting carpel tunnel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I like the gel part for my wrist, provides comfort and the design is really sleek and easy to wipe down if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Mouse Pad
reviews.reviewText: It has a great ergonomic design, and it is large in size. I love the softness of the material, and my mouse flows easily. I will definitely buy more. Hopefully you will keep them in stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Significant improvement in my comfort level and overall health.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Basics Gel Computer Mouse Pad with Wrist Support Rest in Black, and I'm very impressed with the quality and comfort of this product. One of the most important features of this mouse pad is its gel wrist support, which provides excellent cushioning and support for my wrist as I work on my computer.As someone who spends a lot of time on the computer, I often experience discomfort and pain in my wrist and hand. However, since I started using this mouse pad with wrist support, I've noticed a significant improvement in my comfort level and overall health. The gel cushion helps to distribute the pressure from my wrist evenly, reducing strain and fatigue.The ergonomic design of this mouse pad is also beneficial for my posture and overall health. The raised wrist rest encourages a more natural position for my arm and hand, reducing the risk of repetitive strain injuries like carpal tunnel syndrome. Additionally, the smooth surface and non-slip backing of the pad make it easy to use my mouse with minimal effort, further reducing strain on my hand and wrist.Overall, I highly recommend the Amazon Basics Gel Computer Mouse Pad with Wrist Support Rest to anyone looking for a comfortable, supportive, and health-promoting option for their computer work. It's a great value for the price, and I'm very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actual gel, probably will not flatten with time like memory foam.
reviews.reviewText: I had a hard time finding gel pads like those I remember my Dad having for example, that are made of actual gel that does not lose it's sponginess. He had one for his keyboard that was clear, for example, and you could see that it would not lose its shape over time. I needed something like this for my mouse pad. My mouse pad before buying this one had claimed to be gel but was just something like memory foam. I was wary at first with this product but now I'm very happy with this mouse pad because I could feel the difference when touching the padded part of the mouse pad that it is actual gel. It's very easy to tell that it is not memory foam. It has been great using it since it arrived and the bottom of my wrist does not hurt anymore like with the last mouse pad. This mouse pad will probably last you a really long while. (In the future I may revisit this review but for now I have confidence that it is exactly what I was looking for.)

The Amazon Basics Gel Computer Mouse Pad with Wrist Support Rest is a desk-side savior! The gel cushion provides ergonomic comfort, turning my marathon work sessions into a breeze. The smooth surface ensures precise mouse movements, while the wrist support prevents fatigue. It's a budget-friendly upgrade that delivers top-notch quality. My wrists are singing praises, and my mouse has found its happy place. A must-have for anyone seeking the perfect blend of comfort and functionality.
Esta muy resistente la almohadilla no se siente dura, llevo como 3 meses usándola y mi muñeca no me ha dolido, viene amplia, la recomiendo mucho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gives good support to the wrist

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr gute Qualität zum akzeptablem Preis, passt!
reviews.reviewText: Die Formgebung und das Kissen sind perfekt, die Qualität passt und übertritt mein jetziges Mauspad! Ich empfinde es zum Arbeiten an einem 34Zoll Breitbildmonitor etwas klein, ich benutze aber auch eine LOGI MX Master 3S Maus, die natürlich auch sehr groß ausfällt! Zur Ansicht habe ich ein Bild von meinem "Alten" (Standard Größe) und dem "Neuen" beigefügt.
Materiale di qualità, molto comodo da usare e ampio. Lo sto usando con un mouse verticale abbastanza grande, ed è ampio abbastanza per usare il mouse agevolmente.
